author: Special Correspondent
text: T. S. Surendran, vice-chairman and director of paediatric ophthalmology, Sankara Nethralaya, Chennai was conferred FRCS Edinburgh by The Royal College of Surgeons of Edinburgh at Edinburgh, Scotland on March 18, in a ceremony for the presentation of diplomas, by the president, Michael Lovelle-Jones, a note said.
title: City doctor honoured
